definition: Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss or Sukhavati (Sanskrit)
pinyin: xi1 fang1 ji2 le4 shi4 jie4

sentences.english: Shariputra, the Land of Utmost Happiness is crowned in merits, virtues and splendors such as these.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，极乐国土，成就如是功德庄严。

sentences.english: The summer, in some climates, makes possible to man a sort of Elysian.
sentences.chinese: 在一些地区，夏天给人以极乐的生活。

sentences.english: At this level the experience is one of inner joy or bliss.
sentences.chinese: 在这个层级的经验是内在的喜悦或极乐。

sentences.english: With him as my key I was able to unlock another world, a happier land.
sentences.chinese: 他是我打开另一个极乐世界的钥匙。

sentences.english: Why, I asked, should we not admire the angels themselves and the beatific choirs more?
sentences.chinese: 我自问，为何我们不更爱天使和那极乐的合唱？

sentences.english: The Mind Mandala has two more floor levels, the Exalted Wisdom Mandala and the Great Bliss Mandala.
sentences.chinese: 意城还有两重，为‘无上智慧’部和‘极乐’部。

sentences.english: All formed from the four treasures and for this reason named 'Ultimate Bliss'.
sentences.chinese: 皆是四宝周帀围绕，是故彼国名为极乐。

sentences.english: Only great sorrow or great joy can reveal your truth.
sentences.chinese: 只有深哀和极乐才能显露你的真实。

sentences.english: E.g. Amitabha Buddha (Amituofo) has infinite life for helping countless beings in Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 无量佛陀在极乐世界无穷尽的生命普度众生。

sentences.english: My angel, please take me away from this filthy world.
sentences.chinese: 我愿拥有一个天使，带我进入那极乐的世界。

sentences.english: The judges say I have to go now to Elysium and that it will be nice there. I miss my family.
sentences.chinese: 法官们说我现在可以去极乐世界，那里会很美好。

sentences.english: If ignorance is bliss, you must be orgasmic .
sentences.chinese: 如果无知是福，你一定身处极乐之巅了。

sentences.english: They put on their headphones, drape a hood over their head and drift off into the world of "digital highs".
sentences.chinese: 他们戴上耳机，裹住头部，沉溺于“数码极乐世界”。

sentences.english: For example, consider the beautiful birds of paradise which live in the forests of New Guinea.
sentences.chinese: 比如，新几内亚那些美丽的极乐鸟。

sentences.english: A small niche in the rear houses Amitabha of Sukhavati (Land of Ultimate Bliss).
sentences.chinese: 后面小洞内供西方极乐世界阿弥陀佛。

sentences.english: Life is the abnegation of self to gain the bliss of Nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 生命是为了达到极乐的涅磐而摒弃自身。

definition: Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss or Sukhavati (Sanskrit)
pinyin: xi1 fang1 ji2 le4 shi4 jie4

definition: to greet and usher in (guests, newcomers etc)/(Buddhism) to receive into the Pure Land
to extinguish worries and the sea of grief/nirvana (Buddhism)
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
